banned_urls.limit_reached:
You've reached the limit of {limit} banned URLs for this server.
Use `/bannedurls remove` or `/bannedurls clear` to make space.

remove.missing: `{url}` is not in the banned list.

clear.empty: No banned URLs found to clear.
clear.success: All banned URLs have been cleared.

enforcement.embed_description: {mention}, your message was removed because it contained a banned URL.

actions.none: No actions are currently set for banned URLs.
